question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. sheep
B. shepherd dog
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The shepherd dog is positioned further back in the scene, partially obscured by people and trees, while the sheep is closer to the foreground, making a depth map helpful to confirm the relative positions accurately.
